remarks: Define the multiplication of extended complex numbers and of the complex projective line (Riemann sphere).  In our convention, a product with 0 is 0, even when the other factor is infinite.  An alternate convention leaves products of 0 with an infinite number undefined since the multiplication is not continuous at these points.  Note that our convention entails ` ( 0 / 0 ) = 0 ` .
